ARABIC: وَءَايَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ ٱلْمَشْحُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: A Sign for them is that We carried their families in the laden ship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That We bore their progeny in the laden ark is a sign for them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Another Sign for them is that We carried all their offspring in the laden vessel
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: how We carried them and their offspring inside the laden Ark
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And a sign for them is that We lodged them in a laden ship, while they were in their forefathers backs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And an Ayah for them is that We bore their offspring in the laden ship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And a sign to them is that We bear their offspring in the laden ship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And a sign for them is that We carried their seed in the laden ship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And a token unto them is that We bear their offspring in the laden ship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Another sign for them is that We carried their offspring in the laden Ark.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And a sign Unto them is that We bear their offspring in a laden ship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: A sign for them is that We carried their progeny in the laden ship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And a Sign for them is that We bore their race (through the Flood) in the loaded Ark;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And an Ayah (sign) for them is that We bore their offspring in the laden ship [of Nuh (Noah)].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And a sign for them is that We carried their offspring in the laden Ark (of Noah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Another sign for them is that We carried their offspring in the laden Ark.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And a sign for them is that We carried their forefathers in a laden ship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:41] And a sign for them, of Our power, is that We carried their seed (dhurriyatahum: a variant reading has dhurriyyātihim), that is to say, their original ancestors, in the laden Ark, that is, Noah’s fully-loaded ship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And a token unto them) and a lesson and sign to the people of Mecca (is that We bear their offspring) in the loins of their fathers when the fathers bore their offspring (in the laden ship) the ship of Noah,
